article.title: APIC to Support Prototyping of Photonic Circuit Chips
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: APIC Corporation, Culver City, California, is being awarded a more than $8 million contract modification to a previously awarded Section 845 other transaction agreement for commercial prototyping process technology needed to develop and fabricate prototype photonic integrated circuit chips for use on U.S. Navy and other defense networking and communication systems. The Naval Air Systems Command Aircraft Division, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
